item.title: Comparison of KrakenD vs others
item.description: We wanted to compare our own product with other similar products in the market. In order to do so we used the same environment and conditions and tested the following products: Kong Vulcand Tyk KrakenD For the benchmarks, we based the tests on the benchmarking project varnish/api-gateway-benchmarks. At the time of writing, KrakenD does not support auth features, so we just did the benchmark with test01 Hardware hardware specs  $Model MacBook Pro (MacBookPro11,4) - August 2015 Processor: Intel Core i7 2,2 GHz Setup For this test, we stored this configuration at krakend.
